text: The Invisible is a 2007 Swedish-American teen supernatural thriller starring Justin Chatwin, Margarita Levieva, Chris Marquette, Marcia Gay Harden, and Callum Keith Rennie. The movie, directed by David S. Goyer, was released in theaters on April 27, 2007, and on DVD and Blu-ray Disc on October 16, 2007.  The Invisible is a remake of the Swedish film Den osynlige, which was based on the Swedish YA novel The Invisible by Mats Wahl. It was filmed mostly in and around the city of Vancouver. It was the last film distributed by Hollywood Pictures before the label was once again dissolved, this time permanently by Disney.
